publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2975 Brian Adam: Congratulations to Aberdeen City Council on Reducing the City’s Carbon Footprint—That the Parliament congratulates Aberdeen City Council for winning the Guardian Newspaper Public Services Innovation and Progress Sustainability Award for its work in reducing the city’s carbon footprint.

S3M-2975 Brian Adam: Congratulations to Aberdeen City Council on Reducing the City’s Carbon Footprint—That the Parliament congratulates Aberdeen City Council for winning the Guardian Newspaper Public Services Innovation and Progress Sustainability Award for its work in reducing the city’s carbon footprint. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-2975 Congratulations to Aberdeen City Council on Reducing the City’s Carbon Footprint (lodged on 26 November 2008) Bashir Ahmad*, Kenneth Gibson*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Alasdair Allan*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Rob Gibson*, Aileen Campbell*, Bob Doris*, Bill Kidd*, Nanette Milne*, Bill Wilson*
S3M-2975 Congratulations to Aberdeen City Council on Reducing the City’s Carbon Footprint (lodged on 26 November 2008) Stuart McMillan*, Willie Coffey*
S3M-2975 Congratulations to Aberdeen City Council on Reducing the City’s Carbon Footprint (lodged on 26 November 2008) Alex Johnstone* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
S3M-2975 Congratulations to Aberdeen City Council on Reducing the City’s Carbon Footprint (lodged on 26 November 2008) Angela Constance*, Alison McInnes*
